BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 060457 HAK, an Urban Development Action Area Designation and Project, located at 2341-49 Atlantic Avenue; 1874, 1870 and 2335 Eastern Parkway; 20-30 Sherlock Place, and the disposition of such property, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 37.  This matter is subject to Council Review and action pursuant to ยง197-c and ยง197-d of the New York City Charter and Article 16 of the General Municipal Law.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application no. 20065399 HAK, an Urban Development Action Area Project located at 395 Saratoga Avenue, Council District no. 41, Borough of Brooklyn.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law, at the request of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development, and pursuant to Section 696 of the General Municipal Law for an exemption from real property taxes.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. 20065570 HAM, an Urban Development Action Area Project located at 513 West 157th Street, Council District no. 7, Borough of Manhattan.
